Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 50th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1948...
Earned first career win on 8/7/1953...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/28/1955, off Jesse Peers (TOL)...
Injured on 6/29/1955 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/3/1959 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Columbus on 1/31/1963 (Going to PIL: P V. Wise. Going to : P D. Razo, 3B C. Olson)...
Injured on 6/23/1963 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/14/1965 to a 3-year deal worth $1,624,000 per year...
Released by Capital City on 4/7/1966...
Drafted in 4th round, 94th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1967...
Injured on 8/15/1969 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/10/1975 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1980, off Joseph Ping (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1980, off Joseph Ping (Ash)...
